next_steps: Immediately address the high competition risk by conducting a thorough competitive analysis to identify their strengths and weaknesses and tailor our offering accordingly.
Focus on improving the contract hit rate ratio by analyzing past contract wins and losses to identify areas for improvement in our proposal development process and pricing strategies.

Counteract high competition engagement by proactively engaging with the customer, demonstrating a clear understanding of their needs, and highlighting the unique value proposition of Schneider Electric.
